Articles.Content: I have installed mods that generate new groups of parts but they don't show up in game but they are definitely installed because I see them load on the title screen. How do I fix it because the modding community is great for this game and some mods are really cool. Can anyone help?

Is it a sandbox game or a career game?

If it's a sandbox game they should be there but if it's a career game, you may need to research the technologies before you get the parts...

 

Regards Brad

15 hours ago, Icemanau said:

Is it a sandbox game or a career game?

If it's a sandbox game they should be there but if it's a career game, you may need to research the technologies before you get the parts...

It Is a Sandbox game
